name: Tiny King - Unlock Your Imagination To Find the Lost Cake
name_original: Tiny King - Unlock Your Imagination To Find the Lost Cake
description:
Help the king explore his kingdom to find his lost cake. Find the key in each level and give it to the blue key monster to reach the next one.
You'll need to click, pick up, turn, and drag objects in order to find the key. See if you can find the king's golden tickets, too!
